claim_card.claim: Dark matter, dark energy, and black holes are asserted to be manifestations of the same conserved coherence field, misread through the wrong metric.
claim_card.test_hook: Treat as a unification claim: derive at least one shared invariant or shared saturation behavior that must hold across the three regimes; test against baseline models that treat them separately.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: These are not separate problems... manifestations of the same conserved coherence field
